column3: “Love this stuff. After a long day at work it relaxes my entire body and relieves any muscle tightness. My head stays clear after smoking and I feel alert but relaxed at the same time. Definitely one of my favorites”
“One of my Top 10 strains. An even mind/body high that clears your head and lifts your spirits. Good for depression, anxiety, headaches and general aches and pains.”
“Great Strain very positive and uplifting , Good for stress and tension relives all of the have too's to want toe's. This strain is a there is no such thing as time time waits for us.”
“FLAV is amazing dryouth”

“What a treat The Flav was, a tasty bud that hits you behind the eyes to remind you of it's Romulan background. I enjoyed the balance and energy that The Flav blessed me with. Overall a nice mix for MS'ers who may have creative projects, household chores or social gatherings to attend and need to be energized with a great disposition. Helped bring me out of serious MS blues.”
“very nice. picked up twice now”
“Very stoney strong herb right here. I felt the head start to get light after lighting this one. Taste and smells great. More herb please”
“Great Newest Strain that I have tried. Great for pain and very smooth.”

“I just pinched from one of my flowering girls. So with that being said, I am sure there are many more positives to come in the very near future. This looks to be a moderate yielding plant. Lots of trichomes and they arrived very early. The smell is pine with sage.”
“Smooth taste, uplifting high not too heavy but also noticeable indica traits. This is a happy medium for me between indica and sativa a working mans bud"
column4: when he or she needs a bit more than a true sativa. I would recommend this strain.”"

column3: “Great Newest Strain that I have tried. Great for pain and very smooth.”
“I like this variety for a wake n bake option. I find it subtle, and gradual, and long lasting. One bowl takes me right into the afternoon!”
“Great taste and LOTS of crystal! Great buzz in the head!”
“smoke it up at silverstem”
“Smells great, Get really high from one bowl. Not overly munchie. It is a 40s/60i so you get a hard crash that makes it hard to stay awake.”
“Caused some anxiety but was good for creativity. Better than nothing but would not recommend for treating anxiety.”
“Top-notch hybrid strain. Great cerebral and body high.”
“smells great looks great tastes great, has nice undertones of high and gets me pretty stoned after one bowl”
“Smells incredible, tastes even better, and it's the best productivity high I've ever gotten”
“awesome, caregiver recently harvested and I tried for 1st time, mellow smooth almost citrus, sticky buds, like real sticky”
“Smells great, Get really high from one bowl. Not overly munchie. It is a 40s/60i so you get a hard crash that makes it hard to stay awake.”
“smoked this strain and forgot that I even bought it.hmmm”
“Nice dense buds, intense indica dominate high! Would pick up again 4/5!”
“smoke it up at silverstem”
“Very good strain. Hybrid but indica dominant. Very stoney feeling cures stress. Taste and smell- wonderful. long lasting high. Definitely recommend this.”

“First of all the buds are perfect, just majestic in appearance.... Caked with trichs, buds are just covered in fuzz. Smells like cherry sweetness & an fuelly danky undertone. Tastes like an exotic fruit... you wanna say cherry buts it's something else, its truly a flavor unique only to this strain...”
“Great taste and LOTS of crystal! Great buzz in the head!”

“The Flav is a potent strain with a wonderful smell and incredible taste. It creates a heavy cerebral effect with a relaxing body buzz to match. I recommend this strain to kill stress and loss off appetite. Some smokers may experience Paranoia, and all will experience cotton mouth of the highest caliber. For veteran smokers.”
“smoked this strain and forgot that I even bought it.hmmm”
“Caused some anxiety but was good for creativity. Better than nothing but would not recommend for treating anxiety.”
“Super noticeable indica back ground, yet energetic and uplifting.  Overall I fell happy and upbeat. Will deff make my top 10 list.”
“Loved this strain. Great flavor, great effects. AND we bought it on sale. Will definitely be purchasing this one again.”

“Wow long lasting hard hitting hybrid that had a great strong long lasting, tasty high. Subcool the breeder from TGA who made this strain has yet to let me down. Ripped bubba was only slightly above avg. coulda been the grower or method but TGA Subcool Genetics are always A++ for the smoker  and grower. Lots of old school genetics here.”
“it was k”
